crates_list.subtitle: Looking for a specific box from your favorite artist or new materials to experiment with? Find all of our previous boxes below - you can even reorder them from our stock in case they aren’t sold out yet!

newsletter_section.title: Upcrate – We draw as one
newsletter_section.text: Captain Crate has hoisted his sails to bring together a community of artists from all over the world and provide them with the best art materials and tips. Every month he sends his mysterious boxes, which he calls UPCRATE, directly to the front door of every member of his art crew.

draw_as_one_section.title: <2>We draw artists</2> together <1></1> <2>with</2> our <2> creative passion <1></1> and give </2> you the tools <1></1> to follow <2>your heart</2>

chosen_one_section.title:
You’re one of the chosen ones who scrolled all the way down.
Check out Captain Crate’s offers here:

sections.title: Captain Crate…
sections.text: has gotten to know a wide <1>variety of art materials</1> and their manufacturers on his travels across the seven seas. He is always looking for new connections and treasures for you - <2>his art crew.</2>

sections.title: ...delivers the best every month...
sections.text: ...from a handpicked selection of new, mysterious materials to you. These are lovingly put together in the crates in order to guarantee our <1>international crew</1> the best quality for trying out new drawing techniques and brands at the lowest price. Each box delivers a <2>new surprise</2> to your home!...

sections.title: …for the art crew
sections.text: Upcrate not only introduces you to hidden treasures of innovative materials, but also broadens your horizons and sparks your creativity. In addition to <1>new materials</1>, you will receive a magazine full of related advice, challenges and opportunities to exchange ideas and <2>make friends with other artists</2> online in order to become better together. One for all and all for one!

sections.title: behind the scenes
sections.text: ...is a team of art lovers, designers and artists. <1>Captain Crate</1> himself was brought to life by our designer Manuel from Hamburg, who designs everything to do with Upcrate with his creative ideas and flair for design. Clemens is the founder of Upcrate and brings the magic and organization into the box through his connections to many global art material manufacturers. <2>A selected team of artists</2> tests and curates the materials for Upcrate to ensure that the materials match so you can let your creativity flow freely!

chosen_one_section.title:
You’re one of the chosen ones who scrolled all the way down.
Check out Captain Crate’s offers here:

form.subtitle:

 just write an email to support@upcrate.art

cancellation_policy.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellation_policy.withdrawal_text: <1>You have the right to withdraw from this contract within fourteen days without giving any reason.</1><1>The withdrawal period is fourteen days from the day where you or a third party named by you, who is not the carrier, has or has taken possession of the goods, provided that you have ordered one or more goods under a single order and these are or will be delivered in a uniform manner, or</1><1>where you or a third party named by you, who is not the carrier, has or has taken possession of the last goods, if you have ordered several goods in a single order and these are delivered separately, or</1><1>where you or a third party named by you, other than the carrier, has or has taken possession of the last partial consignment or piece, provided that you have ordered a product that is delivered in multiple consignments or pieces, or</1><1>where you or a third party named by you, other than the carrier, has or has taken possession of the first good, provided that you have a contract for the regular delivery of goods for a fixed period of time.</1><1>To exercise your right of revocation, you must notify us (Clemens Roosen, Suhrsweg 3, 22305 Hamburg, Germany, Germany, e-mail: info@upcrate.art) by means of a clear statement (e.g. a letter sent by post, e-mail) about your decision to withdraw from this contract. You can use the attached model withdrawal form, which is not required.</1><1>In order to maintain the cancellation period, it is sufficient that you send the notice of the exercise of the right of withdrawal before the expiry of the withdrawal period.</1>
cancellation_policy.consequences_text: <1>If you withdraw from this Agreement, we have selected all payments we have received from you, including delivery charges (except for the additional costs arising from your choosing a different delivery method than the most favorable standard delivery we offer have to repay immediately and at the latest within fourteen days from the date on which the notification of your revocation of this contract has reached us. For this repayment, we use the same means of payment that you used in the original transaction, unless otherwise agreed with you; In no case will you be charged for this repayment fees.</1><1>We may refuse to repay you until we have the goods back or until you have provided proof that you have returned the goods, whichever is the earlier.</1><1>You must return the goods to us immediately and in any event not later than fourteen days from the date on which you inform us of the cancellation of this contract. The deadline is met if you send the goods before the expiry of the period of fourteen days. You bear the immediate costs of returning the goods.</1><1>You only have to pay for a possible loss in value of the goods, if this loss of value is due to a handling that is not necessary for the examination of the nature, characteristics and functionality of the goods.</1>

what_the_artcrew_says.title: what the art crew says:
what_the_artcrew_says.text:
If you want to send us a review about upcrate just
send us a DM on instagram:)

quotes.author: Kaia
quotes.text: “I use Upcrate to fuel my creativity and experience new art supplies. Each crate is like a little treasure chest I find on my doorstep every month.”

quotes.author: Multicooleur
quotes.text: “Upcrate is the first art supply box I have ever tried and that I recommend to everyone. You’ll find all you need to make an awesome piece of art and discover new mediums . I personally enjoy the little extras, they never fail to surprise me !”

quotes.author: Karolien
quotes.text: “I love how upcrate surprises me every month by letting explore art suplies that I never would consider to try out. I get out of my comfort zone discover new media and found new art supplies that I love.”

quotes.author: Sönke
quotes.text: “Upcrate is like a grab bag full of high quality art supplies. Every month I look forward to the challenge of creating an artwork for the #upcratebattle with new, partly unknown art supplies.”

featured_artists_we_worked_with.title: Featured artists we worked with
featured_artists_we_worked_with.text: These are 4 of the many artists we have worked with in the past. Each of them come with their own unique styles, knowledge and preferences when it comes to art supplies. They curate the contents of their monthly box to make sure that all the materials work well together. Don’t forget to check them out and shower them in love!

upcrate_battle.prize_example: <1>Win great prizes every month</1>E.G. 60 Rembrandt Soft Pastels

steps.text: Cut out the battle card, find out about this month’s battle theme and use the materials from the Upcrate for your piece.
Take a photo with your art and the Battle Card and upload it to Instagram using the hashtag #upcratebattle!

upcrate_battle.checkout_instagram: Check out all the amazing #upcratebattle entries on Instagram!

how_it_works.title: How it works
how_it_works.subtitle: If you’re not familiar with subscription boxes then you might be wondering how this all works. It’s fairly simple….

steps.text: choose your sailing schedule (1 or 3 months), add it to the cart and checkout.
our art treasures will be put together by Captain Crates crew and will be shipped out with the next batch of boxes on the 15th of each month.

Unbox your creativity with your new supplies and our co-captain’s (artist of the month) video, interview and art advice. Share your artwork your the art crew (#upcrate) and participate in our monthly #upcratebattle!
If you loved your box and want to stay subscribed - relax and wait until the next month. Your subscription automatically renews and your next crate is already saved for you.

In case you’re getting seasick on the way and you’d like to cancel your subscription, simply log into your customer account and opt out at any time. No further payments will be taken until you decide to hop on board again.

invite_friends.text: If you refer a friend to us via Facebook, Twitter or email and he/she/they subscribe, you will both receive a 15% discount on further purchases. For example, if your friend subscribes for 3 months, you will receive a discount code with a value of € 8.16 that you can redeem in our shop!

the_bottle_post.title: The bottlepost
the_bottle_post.text: Each of our boxes comes with yet another treasure for you: the bottlepost is our monthly magazine that provides you with every important information regarding your new art supplies and their brands, Upcrate itself, our artcrew and contests, the monthly featured artist and useful art advice!

Professional

professional_howto_videos.text: To help you get started, each of our monthly featured artists films a video about their crates, preferred materials and drawing processes! Learn from the best and make the most out of the new supplies you own. Stay tuned over at our YouTube channel for more!

links.text: How do I subscribe to Upcrate?

time_for_art.title: Advantages for members of the art crew:

advantages.text: Be surprised by a mystery box full of great materials each month
Receive a wide range of high quality art materials for a small price
Take part in challenges & giveaways via Upcrate’s social media and win great prizes
Expand your artistic skills and learn from professional artists
Use your coordinated materials for your own art projects

faqs.question: How do I subscribe to Upcrate?
faqs.answer: Click here to select your plan. It’s easy and you can cancel at any time!

faqs.question: Where does Upcrate ship to?
faqs.answer: It is simple. We ship worldwide.

faqs.question: Do I have to expect a delivery charge?
faqs.answer: Shipping is always free of charge unless you live in a country where our packages have frequently been lost in the process. In that case, a mandatory tracking charge of EUR 2.50 applies to make sure your crate arrives safely. You can see whether you are affected by this on the checkout page.

faqs.question: Which art supplies will be in the crate?
faqs.answer: That’s a surprise and part of the excitement of Upcrate! You’ll never know what is going to be inside before it arrives, but you can be certain that you’ll discover new, high quality art supplies you might love.

faqs.question: How many items will be in each crate?
faqs.answer: This is a mystery as well. The box is filled depending on the value of the art supplies. You can be sure that the value of the content is worth more than the price you pay for the subscription.

faqs.question: Why is there a cut-off date?
faqs.answer: Each month we have a cut-off date to ensure we can plan for all the boxes to be packed and shipped. All subscribers that start with their Upcrate after this date will be added to the subscriber list for the next month.

faqs.question: How long until I get my crate?
faqs.answer: Your boxes will be shipped around the 15th of the month. Once your crates have been shipped out, we will notify you. It will take about 4-8 days for subscribes in Europe and 10-15 days to reach international subscribers.

faqs.question: I’d love to gift this box to a relative or friend! Is that possible?
faqs.answer: Yes! Just click the “gift” option in your cart and fill out your invoice address and the delivery address of the person you want to surprise with Upcrate. Your loved one is going to receive their box with the next batch of boxes we ship out into the world… and they’ll even find a Captain Crate card with their name and yours inside!

faqs.question: What is the difference between a gift box and a regular subscription?
faqs.answer: Gift boxes are an one-time order, meaning that there is no subscription to this option that would automatically renew itself.

faqs.question: How do I become a featured artist in one of the crates?
faqs.answer: We welcome talented artists that would like to become part of Upcrate. Send us an email with some photos of your artworks to info@upcrate.art and we will get back to you soon.

faqs.question: I’d love to see my products and art supplies in one of your future crates? How do I get in touch with you?
faqs.answer: You are convinced our subscribers should get their hands on your products? Send uns an email at support@upcrate.art with more information about your products and we’ll get back to you.

faqs.question: How can I pay to subscribe?
faqs.answer: You have different options like using Paypal, credit cards. Check out our payment options during the check-out process.

faqs.question: Can I pay in US dollars or any other currency?
faqs.answer: As we are based in Germany all prices on the website are listed in EUR. If you are an international subscriber your payment provider will make the conversion to your local currency automatically.

faqs.question: When will I be billed for my subscription?
faqs.answer: You will be billed once you start your subscription. For all following boxes it depends on your chosen plan. Have a look here.

faqs.question: If I cancel my subscription, do I get a refund?
faqs.answer: Canceling your subscription only stops the subscription and prevents any more payments being processed. You will still be sent the number of boxes that you had previously paid for before cancelling. You may have the chance to get a refund unless the box has been shipped. Please get in touch with us at support@upcrate.art

faqs.question: Any other questions?
faqs.answer: Feel free to contact us anytime at support@upcrate.art! We are looking forward to hearing from you!

faqs.question: When can I quit my subscription?
faqs.answer: You can cancel your subscription at any time. Just login into your account. Click to “My subscription”, there you can find the Action “Unsubscribe”.
